title: Bronze 1 Need teammates!
body:
I’m a Bronze 1, EUW Brand mid main; I can also play support - Brand, Soraka, Blitz, Alistar, Morgana. I can play top also: Wukong, Garen (obviously). I need partners particularly in jungle and adc. Please add me if you think we can help each other and if you are roughly around Bronze 1! (Anything around high Bronze, low Silver). 

Thanks, 

Dikko

replies.body: Map awar'd'ness is strong in you huh. I can tell.

I reckon you'll have *much* more success by posting this on the EUW Boards.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
